section.title: slee
section.para: slee command interacts with javax.slee.management:name=SleeManagement MBean. It is standard JSLEE MBean. slee allows basic operations like start/stop.

It supports following operations:
Operations table for slee command
Operation Short form Long form Argument Options
start -r --start No No
stop -s --stop No No
gracefulStop -g --gracefulStop No Yes
shutdown -d --shutdown No No
info -i --info No No

section.title: start
section.para: start operation starts container. Container has to be in STOPPED state. This operation does not accept options nor arguments. Example invocation:

section.title: stop
section.para: stop operation stops container. Container has to be in RUNNING state. This operation does not accept options nor arguments.Example invocation:

section.title: gracefulStop
section.para: gracefulStop operation stops container gracefully. This is an extended command. Please see Commands Extended chapter for details.

section.title: shutdown
section.para: shutdown operation terminates container. Difference to stop is that container is no longer accessible. This operation does not accept options nor arguments.Example invocation:
